DOC.brief_summary: Background : The aim prospective , randomize , double-blind study determine effective supplemental analgesic , paracetamol lornoxicam postoperative pain relief lower abdominal surgery . Methods : Sixty patient schedule low abdominal surgery general anesthesia randomly allocate receive either isotonic saline ( Control group ) , intravenous paracetamol 1 g every 6 h ( Paracetamol group ) lornoxicam 16 mg 8 mg 12 h ( Lornoxicam group ) . Additionally pain treated postoperatively use morphine patient-controlled analgesia . Postoperative pain score measure verbal pain score ( VPS ) , morphine consumption incidence side effect measure 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 24 hour postoperatively .
DOC.brief_title: Lornoxicam vs. Paracetamol After Lower Abdominal Surgery
